name: Gong-Meditation
0:
”Alexa open Gong Meditation”
”Alexa start Gong Meditation”
”Alexa ask Gong Meditation for ten minutes gong every two minutes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gong meditation
des:
Meditation with regular gong chimes

To-do lists, tasks and responsibilities may sometimes feel like they're taking our breath away. A short break from the stressful everyday life can be a helping and strengthening experience for everyone. For your gong-meditation session you can freely choose a length that fits your needs and time constraints. Customizable intermediate gongs give you clues as to how much time has passed on the journey into yourself.

This way, you can tailor the meditation session for you individually: For example, you could start a 15-minute session with a gong every 5 minutes. The session starts with the first gong. In the next 5 minutes, you could do some breathing exercises first. After the 5-minute gong, you follow up with some stretching exercises. After the 10-minute gong, your quiet meditation phase could follow, in which you try to clear your head. The session ends after 15 minutes with two consecutive gong tones. By now, you feel refreshed and strengthened.

Of course, you can split your meditation session in a completely different way. The skill adapts to your wishes.

Do you have questions or suggestions? Write us to hello@dave42.com!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
